text:
Upto 3$ for one dosage of COVID-19 vaccine! Who will buy it in Africa? Not anyone living on less than a dollar a day. I spoke to @docthakkert Chair, Africa Healthcare Federation on #Africamatters abt Africa's race 4 COVID-19 vaccine
#covid19 #vaccine #COVAX 
More on @trtworld https://t.co/yA1Svbq0MR
